revised_title: Photosensitization by Chlorophyll a Monolayers and Quinone Interactions
tldr: This study investigates the absorption spectra and fluorescence quenching in systems consisting of chlorophyll a monolayers and plant quinone monolayers. The research also examines light-initiated redox reactions in these systems when adjacent to a liquid phase containing a redox pair. The findings provide insights into the interactions between chlorophyll and quinones, which play a crucial role in photosynthesis.
